replies.body:
"We're going to bring the other keystones up to Thunderlord"

-> Nerfs Bond of Stone

and still nothing done to thunderlords decee an is still what everyone should be building. also why dosent league have a log out button not just a close button for ppl who have more then one acc this is really annoying having to closeit then re open it just saying

1) Thunderlords isn't broken, it's just that none of the other keystones are typically viable. The others need to be buffed, not thunderlords being nerfed.

2) You're only supposed to have one account.
With thunderlords, though, I think it's kind of stupid that DOT spells such as Miss Fortune's e and Morgana's W add on a stack towards the 3 hits of thunderlords per tick

> [{quoted}](name=FizzInYouJayce,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=cmEhc6cj,comment-id=000800000000,timestamp=2016-01-14T04:49:55.966+0000)
>
> With thunderlords, though, I think it's kind of stupid that DOT spells such as Miss Fortune's e and Morgana's W add on a stack towards the 3 hits of thunderlords per tick

Exactly.

1) Says who?

2) What if I share a computer with other players of League?

3) It's a simple quality of life feature which is very easy to implement.
when does the elo reset happens?
This article might have the information you are after - http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/2016-ranked-season-kicks-soon

hey im getting this bug after the patch where in champ select u know how the back goes grey ish when u choose summoner spells right? after chooing the grey stays and i am unable to click, change runes or masteries, and champs. its really screwing me up hard. also chat is broken real bad right now in client

Hey man,

Make sure to get in touch with player support if you are having tech issues

http://support.riotgames.com/

The new champ select, AND NO MORE BOT LANE MINIONS WANDERING TO TOP LANE, STOPPING IN THE LANE AND JUST PERVING. I COULD KISS YOU. Now all that needs fixing is turret collision bugs for movement and spells. Disagree with the bond of stone changes, because of the taking others damage you have extra protection to offset the change and now its boring and less viable than even before. My thresh dislikes you intensely for that.
NEXT patch you guys need to make a change to thunderlords because this is the real annoying part of it. Giving too much power to Aoe dots and crap where that one ability will add a stack towards thunderlords, which is just plain silly. Also by doing that it might usher people in the right direction with who they pick thunderlords with. Bursty attackers with casts and melee should stay in benefit with this change (such as riven or jax) and people who like to play morgana cant just q and w someone to proc thunderlords while staying safe as a button. Same for MF, rains bullets way out of safe range and still gets to proc thunderlords, damage needs to stay skill relative and not free. 
Also love the changes to the mortal reminder and such items. Good haul, Overall great patch but as always improvement is necessary. :3 Thanks rito.

It doesn't... Or rather, they never really reset your elo.

Now, in some cases this is alright (Plat, Diamond, etc.) since you don't want to have to climb up from silver or gold all over again. But for the 70% of the playerbase who are Bronze or Silver, you'll probably end up right where you finished off, or lower.
Ended S5 in Bronze 4? Win 10/10 provisionals to get into Bronze 3, 7 to get into Bronze 4, and 5 or less to get into Bronze 5.
PULL THE LEVER, KRONK.

I just have one issue. At the start of the season riot changed the mastery table based on strategic diversity. After multiple balance changes (which is fine) you have decided to remove strategic diversity from the master bond of stone. Previously it had a niche of "protect you, but if you're around someone you get take their damage but you get a little more protection to offset it". Now bond of stone is literally "ball of 4% damage reduction stat" the exact thing you were trying to eliminate at the beginning of the mastery rework.

sivir is playable and is really good if you know how to play her >.>
Sivir usually builds only ad items with less attack speed but most items are in favor of attack speed and crit adc

so when is the rengar nerf??

I've now played a few games as Poppy since the changes to her Q and put simply, the changes have to be reverted.

Before the changes I could E onto a champ then direct my Q in a certain direction so the enemy's most likely escape route was cut off.  This gave the most chance of both parts of the Q damage hitting the enemy.

Now I E onto a champ and Q and the Q goes out in front of my E direction which is very rarely where I want it to go.  I'm finding it much harder to lane since the changes.  Especially early when Poppy struggles a bit and every bit of damage in a trade matters.
Won't do anything to deter mid-laners from rushing {{item:3092}}.
